properties.Name: 7 Hills Community Pantry - 7 Hills Community Pantry
properties.Hours: Fri 11 am-12:30 pmDates: All YearMeetings: Board meets monthly
properties.Description: COVID19Operating as a call in and pick up operation. * Those in need in Warkworth and area can call 705-924-2077 and leave a message of what they require. Leave name and phone number to arrange time for order pick up at food bank door. * Please make arrangement for someone else to pick order up if they are feeling ill. Provides food for those in need.
properties.Eligbility:
No restrictions

Residency Requirements: Warkworth and surrounding area

properties.Name: Alderville First Nation - Alderville Community Food Bank
properties.Hours: COVID19 Hours vary daily. Call ahead for food needs.Dates: Year round
properties.Description: COVID19 Food orders will be filled and box of food will be left outside for pick up at arranged time.Community Food bank
properties.Eligbility: First Nation community. * Low income and or OW/ODSP recipients.

properties.Name: Brighton Fare Share Food Bank - Brighton Fare Share Food Bank
properties.Hours: Food Distribution: first, second, fourth, fifth Mon of the month 9 am-12 noon * third Mon of the month 5:30 pm-8 pmFood Donations accepted: Wed 9 am-12 noonDates: All Year
properties.Description:
COVID19 Food Bank remains open but clients will have their food brought to their car in the parking lot in a grocery cart.

Food assistance to those in need
properties.Eligbility: Residents of The Municipality of Brighton
properties.DisabilityAccess: Partially Accessible - Parking - Not Accessible; Entrance - Useable; Washrooms - Not Accessible

properties.Name: Campbellford Fare Share Food Bank
properties.Description:
COVID19 Food bank remains open * one person at a time 
 
Provide food assistance to those in need 
* Offers information about other services and encouragement 
* Works together with area churches, the Salvation Army and Northumberland United Way to offer this service 
* Emergency services available.

properties.Name: Community Health Centres of Northumberland - Food Cupboard
properties.Hours: By appointment only, Thursdays 1:30 pm to 4:00 pm.
properties.Description: By appointment only. 1 person in the office at a time

properties.Name: Community Works in Hamilton Township - Food Bank
properties.Description: COVID19 Food bank is open as a drive through only. * Pre-packaged food * Not accepting clothing, toys or household items donations at this time.Provides food only at this time. The clothing, children's toys and small household items operation is suspended until after the Community Centre is re-opened.

properties.Name: Hastings & Roseneath Ministerial Food Bank - Hastings & Roseneath Ministerial Food Bank
properties.Address: Trinity United Church; 3 Albert St W
properties.Hours: First three Tue of the month 1 pm-2:30 pm, 6:30 pm-8 pmFood donations (please check expiry date) to be made outside food bank opening hours, by arrangement.Dates: Jan-mid Dec
properties.Description:
COVID19 Service by appointment only. Call 705-696-2295.

Food bank provides clients with food for approximately 4 days.
* Clients are asked to use the food bank only once a month
* Occasionally baby food or formula is available

properties.Name: Meals on Wheels
properties.Description: Community Care Northumberland. Currently delivering frozen meals only.

properties.Name: Port Hope Salvation Army Community and Family Services

properties.Description: COVID19Food cupboard program is currently suspended. The Food Cupboard's purpose is to make food accessible. * For those using the food cupboard proof of address is required (i.e. utility bill) * Bring your own bags.
properties.Eligbility: Everyone must provide proof of address. Under the age of 18 must have proof of independence and address
